a.data-description: Thank you healthcare workers! On behalf of the students and staff of Union Day School, we wish to express to you our sincerest thanks for your sacrifice in the healthcare field. Your service to your community and dedication to care, especially during this pandemic, is absolutely exceptional. Your courage knows no bounds, and you have our most sincere admiration and gratitude for being our guiding light during this difficult time. From the depths of our hearts, thank you for your incredible work, and for the many lives you have saved with your compassion. #UDSdifference #gratefulgrphons #nccharterschools #unioncountync #mecklenburgcounty #atriumhealth #novanthealth

img.alt: Thank you healthcare workers! On behalf of the students and staff of Union Day School, we wish to express to you our sincerest thanks for your sacrifice in the healthcare field. Your service to your community and dedication to care, especially during this pandemic, is absolutely exceptional. Your courage knows no bounds, and you have our most sincere admiration and gratitude for being our guiding light during this difficult time. From the depths of our hearts, thank you for your incredible work, and for the many lives you have saved with your compassion. #UDSdifference #gratefulgrphons #nccharterschools #unioncountync #mecklenburgcounty #atriumhealth #novanthealth
